settings.title: EAT + DRINK
settings.subheading: Come have breakast and lunch with us at our cafe! We serve breakfast from 8-11am M-F, & 9am-11am Saturdays. Lunch is served from 11-3pm Monday- Saturday. Cafe is closed on Sundays.

settings.title: Make an Impact
settings.subheading: Supports multiple text alignments and mobile-specific images.

settings.text:
THE COOK'S BROTHER
Roast beef, tomato, provolone cheese, garlic aioli, shoestring fries, on Texas Toast -$12.99

THE ITALIAN SNOB
Mortadella, ham, fennel salami, house made banana peppers, red onion, spicy aioli, provolone, parmesan dressing -$12.99

CHICKEN & SHRIMP GUMBO

TOMATO-VEGGIE SOUP
Fennels, onions, celery, squash, chicken stock, basil, white wine, heavy cream, garnished with croutons and pecorino romano -$4.99

settings.text:
Come dine in our cafe with us! We pride ourselves on using local produce in our cafe that serves breakfast from 8am-11am Monday-Friday, and 9am-11am on Saturday. Our cafe also serves lunch from 11am-3pm Monday-Saturday. Cafe is closed on Sunday. At our wine and beer bar, you can find a variety of tapas plates served from 4:00-8:00pm Monday-Saturday. We also serve wine and beer by the glass starting from 10am-8pm, so you can sip and shop!

Cafe Hours:
8:00AM - 3:00PM
Breakfast: 8:00AM-11:00AM
Lunch: 11:00AM - 3:00PM
Cafe is closed on Sundays

settings.title: Grab & Go
settings.text:
Grab and Go Gourmet Items

(Medium & Large sizes available by request)

Egg Salad

Pimento Cheese

House Truffled Boursin Cheese Spread

Italian Shrimp Salad

Smoked Trout Dip

Scratch made Soups & Pasta Sauces

settings.title: Breakfast Menu- Served until 11:00am
settings.text:
• SUNRISE BISCUIT: Drop biscuit, fried egg, house made pork sausage or bacon, cheddar

  • BREAKFAST BURRITO: Eggs, avocado, smoked gouda, potatoes, crema, onion, pepper

  • SOUTHERN BREAKFAST PLATE: 2 eggs, bacon or ham, toast, home fried potatoes

  • BREAKFAST HOAGIE: Fried bologna, breakfast potatoes, two fried eggs, arugula, Havarti cheese, green tomato relish

  • AVOCADO TOAST: Smashed avocado, fresh herbs, pickled onions, marinated tomatoes, Olivelle Meyer lemon balsamic, on Rise bakery sourdough toast

  • BREAKFAST CROISSANT: Roasted tomatoes, goat cheese, asparagus, fontina cheese, omelet eggs, and garlic aioli

  • BREAKFAST SANDWICH: Calabrese salami, scrambled eggs, Manchego cheese, arugula, Smokey aioli, on a ciabatta roll

Please look for a rotating selections of pastries and sweets in our bakery display case!

Many Vegan (V) and Gluten Free (GF) options available.

settings.title: Lunch Menu- Served from 11:00am-3:00pm
settings.text:
• GRILLED CHEESE: Halloumi cheese, red onion, avocado, Boursin, garlic aioli, hoagie roll

  • THE CHIPPER: Sliced roast beef, crispy pepperoni, tomato, provolone cheese, red onions, Chipper sauce, on a house bun

  • TCS MUFFALETTA: Mortadella, ham, salami, olive relish, arugula, provolone cheese, garlic aioli, on house focaccia

  • SPRING BLT: Pecanwood smoked bacon, marinated tomatoes, crunchy lettuce, Alabama white sauce, on a house made cheesy flatbread

  • TCS TURKEY WRAP: Turkey, greens, Havarti cheese, pickled banana peppers, red onion, smoky aioli, mustard vinaigrette, on a spinach wrap

  • SHRIMP ROLL: Chilled shrimp salad, charred orange aioli, shaved fennel, fresh herbs, Olivelle Meyer lemon vinegar, Olivelle blood orange olive oil, on a hoagie roll

  • CHICKEN ROMESCO: Marinated grilled chicken, Calabrese salami, Manchego cheese, arugula, grilled red onions, yellow pepper Romesco sauce, on a house bun

  • VEGAN BLT: Bacon infused tofu, fried green tomato, mixed greens, roasted red pepper spread, on Texas toast

settings.title: Bowls & Salads
settings.text:
BOWLS AND SALADS

(available all day in the Grab & Go case)

TCS COBB SALAD: mixed greens, turkey, ham, bacon, blue cheese, onions, tomato, egg, ranch dressing.

UDON NOODLE SALAD: green onion, sesame seeds, peanuts, bok choy, carrots, cucumber, soy vinaigrette.

HOUSE SALAD: local seasonal greens, red onion, carrots, pickled peppers, cucumbers, house made ranch.

SEASONAL SALAD SPECIALS ADDED DAILY

*ADD A PROTEIN TO YOUR SALAD: Turkey, Shrimp, Chicken, sliced Ham, Bologna

settings.title: Tapas on the Patio
settings.text:
Served Monday-Saturday from 4:00pm-8:00pm on our patio!

  • Bresaola Carpaccio- Fried capers, shaved parmesan cheese, extra virgin olive oil, picked herbs; GF - $11.75

  • Fish & Grits- Smoked trout, goat cheese polenta, caviar, parsley, dill, crema; GF -$11.50

  • Dip Trio- Seasonally rotating dips served with house made crostini -$10.00

  • Chef's Meat & Cheese- Chef's selection of meats & cheeses with accoutrements -$14.00

  • Cucumber Tofu- Soy, honeysuckle, chili paste, sweet onion, crisp lettuce; Vegan & GF-$8.00

  • Burrata Salad- Cured tomatoes, wilted herbs, sweet pickled peppers, greens; GF -$8.50

  • Warm Mixed Olives -Zaatar, shallots, white balsamic, citrus; Vegan & GF- $6.00

  • Parnsip Hummus- Crunchy oil, served with crackers and seasonal vegetables; Vegan -$8.00

  • Whipped Feta & Honey- Mint, extra virgin olive oil, pecans served with crostinis -$7.50

settings.title: PANTRY
settings.text: From Olivelle infused oils and vinegars to specialty spices; locally ground grits to prized pickles, we’ve got all the stuff pantry-stockin’ dreams are made of (don’t pretend like you don’t have those)…

settings.title: CHARCUTERIE
settings.text:
What we love about our “sushi”-style charcuterie menu is that you can create your own board of any size (well, we still do the grunt work) based on your tastes, mood and appetite. With this many options, you’ll never run out of new combinations to try on each TCS visit you make.

Graze like the G.O.A.T. on our outdoor patio, saddled up at our wine bar, or take your supplies to-go and design your own board (a super fun activity in itself).

All of our ingredients are thoughtfully sourced from local farms and/or made in our region.

Menu below is subject to change.

settings.title: CATERING
settings.subheading: Hosting a holiday at home? Not to brag or anything, but we’re the co-hosts that do the most.  Need a tray of sandwiches for a business lunch? Well then watch productivity skyrocket – especially when you contact us for your catering needs.  Fill out our catering request form below, and a team member will be in touch to plan the best of menus with you. Please note that as of now, all catering orders must be picked up – we don’t deliver or set up offsite (yet).  Pssst – we also offer private event space and cater special events in-house, too.

settings.code:
CATERING

Hosting a holiday at home? Not to brag or anything, but we’re the co-hosts that do the most. Need a tray of sandwiches for a business lunch? Well then watch productivity skyrocket – especially when you contact us for your catering needs. Fill out our catering request form below, and a team member will be in touch to plan the best of menus with you. Please note that as of now, all catering orders must be picked up – we don’t deliver or set up offsite (yet). Pssst – we also offer private event space and cater special events in-house, too.

settings.title: DRINK& BE MERRY
settings.subheading: Long day? Come wine about it with us at our new wine bar and patio (with rotating beers on tap, too). Not a long day? Let’s “cheers” to that!

settings.title: B(U)Y THE BOTTLE
settings.text:
Whether you fancy yourself a moonlighting sommelier-type OR you select wine at the store based on the merits of label design (no shame in that game), we have an expertly curated, eclectic and affordable selection of retail bottles of wine from all over the world.

Grab a new bottle off the wall and a family meal from our fridge for peace of mind on your workday trek home. Pair a wine with local cheeses (we’d love to help you with selections). Together let’s build a custom gift basket for your more-than-deserving neighbor/aunt/teacher/friend (we’ll then wrap it for ya, too).

Now that’s bottle service!
